title: How to make the most out of the Azure CLI Interactive Mode | Azure Tips and Tricks
excerpt: In this video of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to make the most out of the Azure CLI interactive mode.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips  Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit.
